text: Ara ami srsti karechi doyakhera jan'ya bahu jbina o manusa. Tadera antara rayeche, tara dbara bibecana kare na, tadera cokha rayeche, tara dbara dekhe na, ara tadera kana rayeche, tara dbara sone na. Tara catuspada jantura mata; baram tadera ceye'o nikrstatara. Tara'i hala gaphela, saithilyaparayana.
